channel.title: Learn to code development. (Using a Server!) Release! V1.0
channel.description:
Okay, here's V1.0 of the project I spent the last two hours making. (I only really started to do major work two hours ago, the rest was .CFGs)
My project's link is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,391526.0.html
What this has currently is nothing more then Tutorial Island teaching you the basics and by basics I do mean basic.
Pictures: none, it doesn't require them as it's a tutorial Virus scan: you're a tool.
Credits: Jeba (Myself for starting this project) B B0yz 4 (helped me get the project moving) (anthony) for his helpful case/packets list (I suggest using to learn things better http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,291645.0.html) Figment (Source) Czar (base)
Downloads: Rapidshare: http://rapidshare.com/files/268706339/Runescape_development_server.rar.html Megaupload: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ZXMYNMY0

item.title: Learn to code development. (Using a Server!) Release! V1.0
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

hellonobb:

woot first post i dunoo if ill donwload

It’s nothing special, just to help noobs learn the very basic of p servers.

1.2 will be out in a few hours maybe. I might make up to 1.5 then take a break and let others add on to it while I begin my real project
